General.Name: Tek Seng Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Tek Seng Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in polyvinyl chloride (PVC) related products and polypropylene (PP) non-woven related products. It operates through, PVC and Photovoltaic Solar segments. The company offers PVC flooring, foam sheeting, sheeting, table cloths, leather, tarpaulin, and car mats for various industries, including households, medical, stationery, bedding and mattress, automotive, etc.; PP non-woven fabrics are used in hygiene, medical, and industrial and packaging industries; and cast polypropylene sheets that are used in stationery, food packaging, and other industrial uses. It also trades in polyvinyl chloride and photovoltaic products, such as solar cells, panels, PV systems, and modules; and generates and supplies renewable energy, as well as engages in the letting of properties. The company has operations in Malaysia, Indonesia, Iraq, Yemen, Jordan, Turkey, the Philippines, Somalia, Ivory Coast, South Africa, Nigeria, Singapore, Tanzania, Italy, Myanmar, the United Arab Emirates, and internationally. Tek Seng Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Bukit Mertajam, Malaysia.
